byline.contributor: Ashley Southall reported from New York, and Manny Fernandez from Houston.
byline.original: By ASHLEY SOUTHALL and MANNY FERNANDEZ

abstract: Video seems to show that Gilbert Flores, man fatally shot by sheriff's deputies in San Antonio, had his hands up when officers fired; deputies were responding to domestic disturbance call.
lead_paragraph: The fatal shooting of a Texas man by sheriff’s deputies in San Antonio last week was captured on video that appears to show he had his hands up when the officers fired.

headline.main: Video Suggests Suspect in San Antonio Shooting Had Hands Raised When Shot
headline.print_headline: Video Suggests Suspect Had Hands Raised When Shot

snippet: The fatal shooting of a Texas man by sheriff’s deputies in San Antonio last week was captured on video that appears to show he had his hands up when the officers fired.
